effect.scarlet_violet: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.the_teal_mask: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Pokémon on the user’s side of the field are immune to stat-lowering effects for five turns. guard swap, heart swap, and power swap may still be used. defog used by an opponent will end this effect.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.
